Functions

void SPI_InitMaster (int clkDivider)
 Init the SPI in Master Mode used when running at Master mode enable SPI0, default sending at 8 bit mode MSB transfer first, interrupt inhibit.
void SPI_InitSlave (int clkDivider, void(*callback)(void) __irq)
 Init the SPI in Slave Mode used when running at Master mode enable SPI0, 16 bit mode MSB transfer first, using interrupt enable.
void SPI_SetLength (int length)
 Set the SPI transmit length used when running at Master mode can only work at 8 or 16 bit because of hard coding.
int SPI_Send (int data)
 Send(and receive) data through SPI.
int SPI_Recieve (void)
 Receive data through SPI.
